html:
4.6.21  1:42 pm   would you write a song in 7/8

      not on purpose, but i also wouldn't avoid it

4.6.21  1:34 pm   could you show a journal page from one of your finished projects?

      sure

4.6.21  1:21 pm   Are you able to talk about things other than your work?

      yes

4.6.21  1:19 pm   is it bad that i already know the lyrics of i'm a princess by heart 

      no

4.6.21  1:15 pm   Do you like comic sans?

      it's too good

4.6.21  12:45 pm   What type/model is your drum set

      yamaha maple custom

4.6.21  12:14 pm   bill how will the chimps look in your new song?

      they will probably look like words

4.6.21  12:12 pm   opinions on wireless mirophones?

      almost reliable

4.6.21  11:57 am   Your mind is a mystery most of the time so can you explain why that is?

      i think it's that 'free will' thing that people like to say no one has. i mean, i think everyone has it, but i know i do for sure

4.6.21  10:30 am   What are your thoughts on making a whole musical project shine by yourself, versus collaborating with others?

      for some people it's the only way they can do it

4.6.21  9:59 am   i want to write music but im scared and i think its gonna sound stupid what do i do

      keep the first ones a secret

4.6.21  9:42 am   how do we solve world hunger?

      improve transportation

4.6.21  9:41 am   how do you deal with annoying people?

      annoy someone else (without knowing it)

4.6.21  8:43 am   will the sun one day explode and all of the people on planet earth will have their fates already decided and they will not be able to escape their never-ending doom?

      it's not entirely likely that humans will be here at that time, at least in their current state

4.6.21  7:48 am   you don't use capital letters

      you don't tell the truth, OR use capital letters

4.6.21  6:12 am   are you sometimes high when writing your songs? 

      it's important to be at a medium height. to get a fair perspective on things above vs below

4.6.21  4:46 am   thoughts on rigid body simulation in blender?

      i can never get it to work right

4.6.21  2:56 am   What is creativity?

      potentially changing your mind

4.6.21  2:25 am   how long does it usually take you to come up with song ideas?

      about 4 seconds

4.6.21  1:49 am   If I keep making music will what I make eventually sound how it does in my head, or will it always be better in my head than real life?

      it will be a steadily evolving relationship

4.6.21  1:12 am   You've said before that a reason every part is so clear and audible in your songs is that you actually don't have a lot going on at one time, just a great variety of stuff and musical ideas throughout the whole song that happen at the right time. Do you ever have to stop yourself from piling on a ton of stuff at the same time in the song

     yes

     that sounds cool in the moment but doesn't actually add anything musically?

     one weird trick is to mix all the vocals first to make sure you have all the harmonies fully there, before doing most of the final instrumental arrangement. This is a good way to prevent adding too many chordal sounds because the vocal is already doing it

4.6.21  12:51 am   did the infinity police catch you trying to do infinity again recently

      it happens every 2 or 3 seconds

4.6.21  12:14 am   do you plan on making a long video in the future

      yes

4.5.21  11:54 pm   Is there a reason why you mention love in your songs so much,

     it's normal

     or is that something every artist does?

     yes

4.5.21  11:50 pm   what is your favorite time signature

      regular

4.5.21  11:39 pm   when will darkness cover the earth?

      tonight

4.5.21  9:45 pm   would you ever make a song where the title was more than 15 words long?

      that seems irresponsible but i wouldn't rule it out

4.5.21  9:19 pm   What's your favorite video that you made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.5.21  8:33 pm   Do you have braincells?

     i have 1 huge one

     and if so, can I have them?

      i'm making some improvements on it

4.5.21  8:11 pm   what would you call your genre of music?

      *sensible*

4.5.21  8:05 pm   Are you prepared for the answers you might receive?

      i don't know what they will be

4.5.21  6:41 pm   when will pigs fly

      pretty soon

4.5.21  6:14 pm   just curious, does the song you're working on now contain any messages and/or lessons?

      yes

4.5.21  5:25 pm   Do you think that it's a good idea to reject humanity and to return to monkey ?

      i'm not sure how to do that

4.5.21  4:56 pm   why is your music so danceable

      i'm trying to win points

4.5.21  4:40 pm   When you make a song do you visualize it in a graphic aspect all the time?

      some parts of it

4.5.21  4:39 pm   what made you decide to switch to 3d animation?

      it's just common sense

4.5.21  4:30 pm   is your next song about the current economic state

      no

4.5.21  4:24 pm   is your lyrics "I hope you know that there's no stranger strange enough" about prejudice/racism?

      that's one way to look at it

4.5.21  4:01 pm   i can come up with musical ideas, but most of them aren't any good for the start of the song. how can i either: get better at coming up with ideas for the start, or turn my middle and end ideas into start ideas?

      continue forward and see what happens after. often it will cycle back around. Then, you can search the whole cycle and usually find the starting place

4.5.21  3:48 pm   Do you have any advice for getting motivation for starting songwriting?  

     i think it depends how bad you want it

     Or maybe finding the confidence to write something and not just see it as something really bad and throw it out?

     one weird trick is to try to make the song bad

4.5.21  3:41 pm   what's the best way to remember that there's no point of worrying about things one can't change?

      you could print up some business cards

4.5.21  3:11 pm   Do you have an idea of how the world should work which you try to communicate with every song you make?

      i'm just trying to study how it actually does work

4.5.21  2:38 pm   have you ever been dissatisfied with your music?

      yes

4.5.21  2:30 pm   what do you do when you run out of ideas

      try to think of something that's not an idea

4.5.21  1:27 pm   Is there an idea store nearby?

      you are in it. you are the owner, and co-founder

4.5.21  12:54 pm   You're kinda a perfect example of modern internet success. And you did it by only focusing on the work, not on marketing and social media. No question, just wanna say you're a serious source of inspiration for a lot of artists out there, musicians and not. You showed you actually can do what you want to do, but not in a cheap way like a lot of those "be yourself" posters would tell us growing up. A lot of your music says it. I know you're really just doing what you want to do, but it's awesome you're helping a lot of people do it too

      holy extended holiday vacation, that's a friendly message

4.5.21  11:38 am   What are your thoughts on horses?

      sometimes i am amazed at just how much power they have

4.5.21  10:51 am   in hello sexy pants when you go "hello hello hello hello hello", is that the same clip repeated or you just singing hello that many times

      i think it's probably all different, but given the nature of that figure it probably would have actually sounded better to use the same one

4.5.21  10:38 am   will there be chimps in the next song?

      no but i can see why you would think that
